name: Wine Drop
description:
Wine Drop is an exciting endless casual game of avoiding spiders and catching drops as many as possible.

       *  Choosing a theme that suits you and enjoys the game.

Update v1.3.1 on 2017/05/08:
    * Optimize for better FPS

Background music:
